title: Can't turn off the notification sound during a phone call
content:
This notification's sound can't be turned off, and even if I turn on the DND, it will still make noises and very loud.
Can you separate the sound volume for Ring & notification?
I don't even have audible notification, but why the sound will be turned on automatically when you are on a phone call? it's very loud and distractive!!! pls fix this, at least give us option to mute it!
